name: ComfiLife Gel Enhanced Seat Cushion – Office Chair Cushion – Non-Slip Gel & Memory Foam Coccyx Cushion for Tailbone Pain - Desk Chair Car Seat Cushion Driving - Sciatica & Back Pain Relief (Black)

other_info.Special Feature: Cooling Gel + 100% Premium Memory Foam Cushion

about_this_item: Most Comfortable Gel Memory Foam Cushion On The Market - ComfiLife's all-in-one features are unrivaled: Non-slip rubber bottom, built-in handle for easy transport and machine-washable zippered velour cover for easy cleaning. The ComfiLife Coccyx Cushion is the best gel memory foam seat cushion on the market made of premium quality durable memory foam with cool off gel layer on top for superior comfort
Supports Tailbone and Relieves Pressure - Ergonomically designed seat cushion provides maximum support and comfort while reducing pressure on the coccyx / tailbone and promotes healthy posture

Provides Lower Back Pain & Sciatica Relief, Great for Office Use, Driving & Traveling - Supports recovery from lower back problems, herniated discs, tailbone injuries, sciatica and other spinal issues. Great for office, home, travel, car seat or wheelchair use. Machine-washable zippered velour cover for easy cleaning and built-in handle for easy transport

Our Customers Love ComfiLife Cushion - "I have already recommended this to all my office mates that sit all day, as well. I love it, and some advice...Lock it up after you use it, or I guarantee one of your sneaky cube mates will swipe it!" "This has saved my life as one with lower back pain due to pinched nerve roots" "I have herniated discs and sciatica for many years, this cushion allowed me to drive cross state with little to no pain"

Personalized Comfort - We want to emphasize that while our cushion is designed to suit a wide range of preferences and needs, it might not be the ideal fit for all body types or comfort preferences. This is a common characteristic of products designed for ergonomic support and comfort. We encourage giving the cushion a fair trial period to adapt to its feel and support.

title: Verified Purchase
content: I have tried several seat cushions over the years and most work “ok”. Recently after losing 40 lbs, my tailbone started hurting after sitting a while on any of my existing cushions.  I even learned the “proper” to sit on a cushion with the tailbone over the open area and the sit bones on the main part of the cushion. My tailbone still hurt!  I imagine the cushion’s flattened too much. After reading the reviews on this cushion and specifically by someone with similar issue I decided to try it. Within a few days my tailbone pain gradually disappeared.  2 weeks in use now and still wonderful.  I highly recommend this cushion.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2024

title: Excelente Calidad
content: This is my 4th cushion to try, all different price points.  So far I have sat on it one full day and it hasn’t compressed.  The seller reached out to me as a new buyer to give me instructions and information.  The instructions said that in a few days, the cushion will conform to my buttocks.  The cushion is about medium size and fits me.  I’m 5’8” and 223 pounds.  The cushion is comfortable and I don’t have to get up frequently to “walk off the pain.”  For the men out there, there’s not a big shoe horn of cushion in the middle front so you too, can put the 2 separated pieces in the back.  The cover is soft and feels like suede.  The price point is good for the pain relief you get.  I’ve tried some cushions near $100 that were laughable because they compressed immediately and provided no relief at all.  The reasons I need a cushion include that I lost 75 pounds which takes away muscle, fat, collagen, and elastin.  So it’s painful to sit on your two buttocks bones with no cushion.  I also have lumbar back and hip pain.  So those conditions are helped with this cushion for me.  I hope this cushion helps others for my conditions and other situations.  I’m very happy with my cushion.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2024

title: Great product but too thick for my car
content: I bought this for my sewing machine chair. I use a rolling office chair to sit at my machine. I have a bad back and sitting sewing for a long time kills my back. A friend recommended it to me because she has one and loves it. I haven't used it much yet, so it seems a little stiff. I'm sure as I sit on it more it will mold to my bum, and it will be better. My friend also purchased the back support cushion, and she also likes that. I will keep trying the seat cushion first and see how that works before I decide to buy the back cushion.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2024
